All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Act
This interface establishes a common contract for objects that can be viewed or interacted with in the application workflow.
Applicant
The Applicant class represents a user with the role of an applicant in the system.
ApplicantManager
It extends the GenericManager class and provides specific implementations for parsing and adding Applicant users to the system.
Application
This class encapsulates all the information and business logic for managing a housing application through its entire lifecycle, including state transitions, withdrawal requests, and status tracking.
Application.ApplicationStatus
Represents the possible states of an application status in the system.
Application.WithdrawalStatus
Represents the possible states of a withdrawal request for an application.
ApplicationManager
This class handles CRUD operations for applications, including storing applications, filtering and retrieving applications, processing approvals, rejections, and withdrawals.
BookingReceipt
This class contains information about the flat booking, including applicant details, flat type, and project information.
ConfigLDR
It provides methods to read configuration data from CSV files into maps and save map data back to CSV files.
Context
Context class manages the interaction between user inputs, business logic, and various manager classes.
Enquiries
Represents the enquiry in the BTO system.
EnquiriesManager
This class implements the EnquiryAction interface to provide functionality for creating, managing, and responding to enquiries.
EnquiryAction
Interface for managing enquiries in the system.
GenericManager<T extends user>
Abstract base class for user management operations.
HDBManager
HDBManager contains personal information about the manager, their authentication credentials, permission level, and information about their currently assigned project.
HDBOfficer
Represents an HDB Officer in the system with user authentication and personal information.
HDBOfficerManager
HDBOfficer contains personal information about the manager, their authentication credentials, permission level, and information about their currently assigned project.
Main
It provides a user interface to select the type of user accessing the system (Applicant, HDB Officer, or HDB Manager) and directs them to the appropriate login screen.
ManagerController
The ManagerController class extends GenericManager to provide specific functionality for managing HDB managers in the system.
Project
This class encapsulates all information related to a BTO project, including project metadata, flat types, pricing, availability, application periods, and the management team responsible for the project.
ProjectManager
This class provides functionality for managing HDB projects, including creating, editing, and deleting projects, searching and filtering projects based on various criteria, checking project eligibility for users, and storing/loading project data from persistent storage.
Register
A registration connects officer to a project with a specific status (NIL, PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED) and tracks important dates.
Register.RegistrationStatus
Enumeration of possible registration statuses.
RegistrationManager
This class provides functionality for creating, storing, retrieving, and processing registrations.
UI
The UI class serves as a wrapper for the ui_main class, providing configuration loading and initialization for the user interface.
user
Defines the common interface for all user types in the system.
user.PermissionLevel
Defines the permission levels available in the system.
